mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notifications (title, message, notification_type, target_role) VALUES (#{notification.title}, #{notification.message}, #{notification.notificationType}, #{notification.targetRole})
mapper.select: SELECT notifications.title, notifications.message, notifications.created_at, notifications.notification_type, user_notifications.id AS notification_id, user_notifications.user_id, user_notifications.status FROM notifications INNER JOIN user_notifications ON notifications.id = user_notifications.notification_id WHERE user_notifications.user_id = #{userId} AND user_notifications.status = "未読";
